alert.note: Alert for Western Albany; Western Greene; Western Schenectady; Western Ulster (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 11 at 3:47AM EST until March 12 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 10 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 9 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...The Helderbergs and Eastern Catskills. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 10 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult due to snow covered roadways and low visibility. Gusty winds will contribute to blowing and drifting of snowfall. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates may exceed one inch per hour during the day on Saturday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.

area.areaDesc: Western Albany; Western Greene; Western Schenectady; Western Ulster
